site_description: Portfolio site deployed on AWS S3 + CloudFront with CI/CD via GitHub Actions.
name: Deion Tuldias
headline: Building reliable, secure, and automated cloud systems.
subheadline: AWS • S3 • CloudFront • Terraform/CloudFormation • GitHub Actions • Monitoring

projects.title: Static Site on AWS
projects.desc: Deployed via S3 + CloudFront with OAC, HTTPS via ACM, and CI/CD using GitHub Actions (OIDC).

projects.title: IaC for AWS
projects.desc: Provisioned infrastructure with Terraform, enforcing least-privilege IAM and bucket policies.

projects.title: Monitoring & Alerts
projects.desc: CloudWatch dashboards for CDN cache metrics and S3 access logs, with SNS email alerts.
